/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is flanked by towering buildings, their facades painted in a palette of red, white, and gray, reflecting the urban architecture of the city. Cars and buses traverse the road, adding a dynamic element to the scene. The sky overhead is a blanket of overcast clouds, casting a soft, diffused light over the cityscape.
